title: A Checklist for Website Reviews
abstract: When ever I do a front-end review for webpages I start compiling a new checklist of things that I need to take into account for the review. Now I tried to collect some of the most important questions to check for and release them publically.
meta-description: Doing front-end reviews for webpages you need to make sure everything runs smoothly. I've compiled a checklist and release it publically.
